title: Trade Amount (v1)
description: Deterministic currency amount used across trade instruments and settlement plans. value is a decimal string to avoid floating point ambiguity.

currency.description: Currency or unit code. Prefer ISO 4217 (e.g., USD, EUR). For non-fiat units, use a stable uppercase code (e.g., USDC, XAU).

value.description: Decimal string with up to 18 fractional digits.

scale.description: Optional explicit scale. If provided, value SHOULD have <= scale fractional digits.
